annotations.description: Defines the pipeline to build the application
Defines the pipeline to build the application

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.name: STAGE
parameters.description: staging  (indica el tipo de pipleline a realizar)

parameters.name: STAGE_PROD
parameters.description: production (indica el tipo de pipleline a realizar)

parameters.name: PROJECT_NAME
parameters.description: Se indica el nombre del proyecto.

parameters.name: PROJECT_NAME_PROD
parameters.description: Se indica el nombre del proyecto produccion.

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory the Node.js container can use.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_URL
parameters.description: The URL of the repository with your application source code.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_REF
parameters.description: Set this to a branch name, tag or other ref of your repository if you are not using the default branch.

parameters.name: CONTEXT_DIR_JENKINS
parameters.description: Set this to the relative path to your project if it is not in the root of your repository.

parameters.name: APPLICATION_DOMAIN
parameters.description: The exposed hostname that will route to the Node.js service, if left blank a value will be defaulted.

parameters.name: GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET
parameters.description: Github trigger secret.  A difficult to guess string encoded as part of the webhook URL.  Not encrypted.

parameters.name: GENERIC_WEBHOOK_SECRET
parameters.description: A secret string used to configure the Generic webhook.
